name: Parasite
flavor_text: "Constant projections. Unending destruction. The will of every efficient parasite." —Savathûn's worm

frame.name: Worm's Hunger
frame.description: This weapon fires Hive worms which explode on impact. The size and damage of the explosion scales with the number of enemies you've defeated just before firing this weapon.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are larger and travel faster.
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases magazine size
perks.name: High-Explosive Ordnance

perks.description: Taking damage from your own worm projectile detonation empowers your weapons for a short time.
perks.name: Worm Byproduct

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
